name: Croutons (Toasted French Bread Slices)
keywords: butter, french baguette, garlic, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 loaf French bread, about 14 inches long

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the crust of the bread all over and generously with the garlic clove. Cut the bread crosswise into 28 slices of equal width. Arrange the slices on a baking sheet. Brush each slice with butter.
Place the baking sheet in the oven and bake six minutes or until the slices are nicely toasted.
